topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a9a20d636872535b000942#post_55a9a20d636872535b000942
Here's the funny part, and I'm gonna dip into film here. Some of the best and most visionary film directors, writers, and actors are people who just really LOVED movies.  Del Toro used to make amateur movies on his dad's Super 8 camera. Hell Tarantino used to work in a video store for fucks sake!
